div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 13:53 pm CDT

div.div: A 10 percent chance of rain after 5pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 60. South southwest wind 5 to 10 mph.
A 30 percent chance of rain and thunderstorms, mainly before 9pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 33. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph becoming north northeast in the evening.
Sunny, with a high near 65. Breezy, with a northwest wind 5 to 10 mph increasing to 15 to 20 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph.
